alternative_parents.description: Aromatic compounds that are made up of carbon and hydrogen atoms only.
alternative_parents.name: Aromatic hydrocarbons

alternative_parents.description: Polycyclic organic compounds made up only of carbon and hydrogen atoms.
alternative_parents.name: Polycyclic hydrocarbons

alternative_parents.description: Hydrocarbons that contains one or more unsaturated carbon atoms. These compounds contain one or more double, triple, or aromatic bonds.
alternative_parents.name: Unsaturated hydrocarbons

class.description: Compounds containing a fluorene moiety, which consists of two benzene rings connected through either a cyclopentane, cyclopentene, or cyclopenta-1,3-diene.
class.name: Fluorenes

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as fluorenes. These are compounds containing a fluorene moiety, which consists of two benzene rings connected through either a cyclopentane, cyclopentene, or cyclopenta-1,3-diene.

direct_parent.description: Compounds containing a fluorene moiety, which consists of two benzene rings connected through either a cyclopentane, cyclopentene, or cyclopenta-1,3-diene.
direct_parent.name: Fluorenes

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

superclass.description: Aromatic compounds containing one or more benzene rings.
superclass.name: Benzenoids
